goal_description: Marketplace Flow 5 - Extension discovery, installation, management across WebUI and Slack

A_extension_browsing.notes: MarketplacePage loads correctly with 3 featured extensions, category sidebar, search

B_extension_detail.notes: ExtensionDetailPage displays full extension info: name, publisher, rating, downloads, description, permissions, version history

C_installation_flow.blocker: Browser automation tab focus issues preventing click testing

D_slack_mcp_commands.blocker: Slash command /nubabel not registered in Slack app

failures.issue: MarketplacePage crash - Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'length')
failures.root_cause: API response format mismatch - expected suggestions but got data
Route param mismatch - App.tsx used :extensionId but component used useParams<{slug}>

failures.issue: /nubabel slash command not recognized by Slack
failures.root_cause: Slash command may not be registered in Slack app manifest

fixes_applied: MarketplacePage.tsx - suggestions API response format (result.data instead of result.suggestions)
marketplace.ts - added SAMPLE_EXTENSIONS data for featured extensions
